name: dvd+rw_tools
desc:
The dvd+rw-tools package contains several utilities to master 
the DVD media, both +RW/+R and -R[W]. The principle tool is growisofs 
which provides a way to both lay down and grow an ISO9660 file system 
on (as well as to burn an arbitrary pre-mastered image to) all 
supported DVD media. This is useful for creating a new DVD or 
adding to an existing image on a partially burned DVD.
